caption.p: Phytochemical analysis of leaves and stems of A. monosperma and L. crithmoides. L = leaf, S = stem, Ph = phenols (g GAE/100 g dry wt), Fl = flavonoids (g CE/100 g dry wt.), Ta = tannins (g TAE/100 g dry wt), Al = alkaloids (g/100 g dry wt.). GAE: gallic acid equivalents, CE: catechin equivalents, TAE: tannic acid equivalents.
